      • addArmiesToCountryById

        public boolean addArmiesToCountryById​(int countryId,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Country> countryList,
                                      int armiesToAdd)
        This class add armiesToAdd to the armies of country with countryId which is in list of countryList
        Parameters:
        countryId - Id of country to add armies
        countryList - List of the countries to find country
        armiesToAdd - number of armies that player want to add
        Returns:
        it shows the status of update. if armies have been updated, the return true, otherwise, return false.
